short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A new tab page that comes with a variety of productivity enhancing tools.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Included features:
- Top visited sites
- Notepad
- Sticky notes
- RSS feed reader
- Clock
- Current and weekly weather
- Calendar with Google calendar integration
- Tasks
- Timer
- Stopwatch
- Pomodoro timer
- Countdown timer
- Random daily background
- Ability to set your own background from URL or device
